amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $300,000 earmark for Whitworth University Stem Equipment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $300,000 in funding for `Whitworth University Stem Equipment' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 341 (Roll no. 586).
